textSub.name: tagline
textSub.string: A la peanut butter and jelly fish sandwich!

textSub.name: para1
textSub.string:
You've stumbled across a group of roaming jelly fish.
 They're pretty to look at, but watch out for their
 sting! Touch them, and you'll be stunned for a few
 seconds.

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
GOLDEN MINNOWS:
 If you spot a mysterious golden fish try to catch it!
 They're fast, but they'll help you grow much quicker!

textSub.name: objectiveText
textSub.string: When you're stunned, you become a sitting duck, so watch out!

textSub.name: timeObjectiveText
textSub.string: When you're stunned, you become a sitting duck, so watch out!
